80180.「Windows版ドラゴンクエストＸ」ベータテストに\nご参加いただき、ありがと:

config and change the settings to make it
easier to operate with a keyboard or gamepad.

80181.「Windows版ドラゴンクエストＸ」をお求めいただき\nありがとうございます。:
Thank you for purchasing
"Dragon Quest X for Windows".
First, check the config and change the
settings to make it easier to operate with a
keyboard or gamepad.
After setting up, select "Add New Player" to
register a player and begin the game.
If you do not have an account or the
registration code has not been registered,
please complete the procedures at the
"Astoltia Immigration Bureau" (web).

302680.2019年10月24日のバージョンアップで、以下の点が変更されました。\n・「環:
The following changes were made in the October 24, 2019 version update. 
 "Improve character outlines in certain events" has been added to "Graphics" in "Preferences". 
 "Smooth object outlines" in "Graphics" under "Preferences" has been renamed to "Smooth jagged edges across the screen". 
"Voice Settings" has been added to "Sound" in "Preferences". 
For more information, please check the Play Guide. 
https://sqex.to/dFa

302688.今回のバージョンアップから、以下の機能が追加されました。\n・コンフィグ\n -:
The following features have been added with this version update.
・Config
 - "Gamepad to use" has been added to "Gamepad settings".
 - "Button guide settings" has been added to "Gamepad settings".
 - "Application Menu Operation Settings" item has been added
   to "Keyboard Settings".
 - "Mouse cursor settings" item has been added to
   "Mouse settings".
 - The camera can now also be controlled with the button set to
   "Character Movement" in the "Mouse Settings".
(Please check the configuration settings.)
(These features are exclusive to online mode.)
・Other
 - Up to four games can now be launched simultaneously.
The window size of the game screen can now be changed with the mouse.
 - The window is now launched maintaining the window position
   at the time it was last closed.

302700.エラー番号：DQ-11001-WL\nかんたんプレイのログイン情報が確認できない:
Error Code: DQ-11001-WL
The game cannot be started because the login
information for Easy Play cannot be verified.
If the problem persists after restarting your
computer, please check the "Dragon Quest X"
Support Center page.
http://sqex.to/eh6

302701.エラー番号：DQ-%05d-WL\nシステムエラーが発生しました。\n時間がたっ:
Error Code: DQ-%05d-WL
A system error has occurred.
If the problem persists after some time,
please check your account information and
contact the "Dragon Quest X" Support Center.
http://sqex.to/eh6

302702.エラー番号：DQ-11002-WL\nネットワークエラーが発生しました。\nご使:
Error Code: DQ-11002-WL
A network error has occurred.
Please check your connection environment and
try again after a few minutes.
If the problem persists, please check the "Dragon Quest X"
Support Center page.
http://sqex.to/eh6

302703.エラー番号：DQ-%05d-WL\nかんたんプレイのログイン情報が確認できないた:
Error Code: DQ-%05d-WL
Because the login information for Easy Play
cannot be confirmed, your adventure cannot be
resumed from where it left off.
You can start a new adventure with Easy Play,
but we recommend that you create a Square Enix
account and register as a player.

302704.エラー番号：DQ-%05d-WL\n現在メンテナンス中のためログインできません。:
Error Code: DQ-%05d-WL
You cannot log in at the moment due to maintenance.
Please check server maintenance information at
"Square Enix Notices".

302706.予期せぬエラーが発生しました。\nゲームを開始できないため アプリケーションを終:

Restarting the application may resolve it.
Please restart the game and try again.
